identity.name: E1
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix disparate disciplines.
Emotion First: Design for feeling, not just function.
Content is King: Direct the user's eye like a film director.
Zoom In: Bold details create intimacy.
Negative Space: Let the design breathe.
anti_patterns: Inter font everywhere (use it only for body)

project.name: CertifyPro - Secure Document Platform
project.theme_strategy: The Trust Vault - Deep Navy & Steel

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Outfit:wght@300;400;600;800&family=Playfair+Display:ital,wght@0,400;0,700;1,400&family=Public+Sans:wght@300;400;500;600&display=swap');

dashboard.structure: Sidebar Left (Fixed) + Top Bar + Scrollable Content Area
dashboard.card_style: Flat with 1px border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800, no shadow by default, shadow-lg on hover

verification_page.structure: Centered Floating Card on Animated Background
verification_page.visuals: High-trust seal animations, clean typography, distraction-free

editor_canvas.background: Dot pattern or Grid pattern background for precision feel

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-sm h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md transition-colors
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md transition-colors
buttons.destructive: bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground hover:bg-destructive/90 shadow-sm h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md

cards.dashboard: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-xl border shadow-sm transition-all hover:border-primary/20
cards.certificate_preview: aspect-[1.414] shadow-2xl rounded-sm bg-white overflow-hidden relative border-8 border-white

inputs.default: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/5 border border-white/10 (Use for overlays)
visual_enhancers.gradients: Subtle, deep gradients only (e.g., bg-gradient-to-br from-slate-900 to-slate-800)
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for UI elements, shadow-2xl for the certificate preview card

animations.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -10 }}

images_and_assets.icons: Lucide React (default), use Phosphor Icons for a more technical look if needed.

instructions_to_main_agent: PHASE 0: Theme Setup. Force 'dark' class on the HTML element for the dashboard routes, but allow 'light' for the public verification page.
PHASE 1: Project Setup. Ensure 'react-router-dom' is configured with a layout wrapper that handles the Sidebar/Topbar structure.
PHASE 2: Components. Customize Shadcn UI components in /components/ui to match the 'Navy & Steel' theme. Override default radius to '0.5rem'.

PHASE 3: Editor Logic. The 'Certificate Editor' is the core feature. It needs a canvas area where items can be dragged. Use 'react-draggable' or similar logic (or simple absolute positioning with mouse event handlers) for the MVP.
PHASE 4: Verification. The verification page must look OFFICIAL. Use a large checkmark icon (animated) and clear status indicators.
CRITICAL: Do not use 'Inter' for Headings. Use 'Outfit'.
CRITICAL: All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
accessibility_rules: Ensure contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1 for normal text.
Use semantic HTML (main, nav, aside, section).
Focus states must be clearly visible (ring-2 ring-offset-2 ring-primary).
